languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Сдержанно улыбаясь, Кассия взмахивает рукой в знак приветствия.{/n} "Словами не передать, как тоскливо на мостике без наших высоких бесед".

traits.locale_text: "{name}!" {n}Сдержанно улыбаясь, Кассия взмахивает рукой в знак приветствия.{/n} "Словами не передать, как тоскливо на мостике без наших высоких бесед".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Сдержанно улыбаясь, Кассия взмахивает рукой в знак приветствия.{/n} "Словами не передать, как тоскливо на мостике без наших высоких бесед".

traits.locale_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia smiles discreetly and greets you with an inviting gesture.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our lofty conversations."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}！”{n}卡西娅对你露出了矜持的微笑，向你挥手致意。{/n}“失去了你我之间充满启迪的对话，我恐怕无法用言语形容舰桥变得多么无聊。”
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: “{name}！”{n}卡西娅对你露出了矜持的微笑，向你挥手致意。{/n}“失去了你我之间充满启迪的对话，我恐怕无法用言语形容舰桥变得多么无聊。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

languages.text: «¡{name}!». {n}Cassia te dedica una sonrisa y te saluda con la mano.{/n} «No tengo palabras para describir lo aburrido que puede ser el puente sin nuestras fascinantes conversaciones».
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: «¡{name}!». {n}Cassia te dedica una sonrisa y te saluda con la mano.{/n} «No tengo palabras para describir lo aburrido que puede ser el puente sin nuestras fascinantes conversaciones».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}！」{n}カシアは控えめに笑みを浮かべ、手を振って挨拶する。{/n}「刺激的な会話がないブリッジは、言葉では言い表せないほど退屈なものです」
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}！」{n}カシアは控えめに笑みを浮かべ、手を振って挨拶する。{/n}「刺激的な会話がないブリッジは、言葉では言い表せないほど退屈なものです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia lächelt dich reserviert an und winkt dir zur Begrüßung zu.{/n} "Worte können nicht beschreiben, wie langweilig es ohne unsere anregenden Gespräche auf der Brücke ist."
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia lächelt dich reserviert an und winkt dir zur Begrüßung zu.{/n} "Worte können nicht beschreiben, wie langweilig es ohne unsere anregenden Gespräche auf der Brücke ist."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia vous salue de la main, un sourire réservé au coin des lèvres.{/n} « {name} ! Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je m'ennuie sur la passerelle sans nos petites conversations. »
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia vous salue de la main, un sourire réservé au coin des lèvres.{/n} « {name} ! Vous n'imaginez pas à quel point je m'ennuie sur la passerelle sans nos petites conversations. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia sana çekinerek gülümsüyor, ardından eliyle selam ediyor.{/n} "Ufuk açıcı sohbetlerimiz olmaksızın güvertenin ne denli sıkıcı olduğunu anlatamam."
languages.original_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia offers you a reserved smile and waves at you in greeting.{/n} "Words cannot describe how boring the bridge is without our stimulating conversations."

traits.locale_text: "{name}!" {n}Cassia sana çekinerek gülümseyip el sallayarak selamlıyor.{/n} "Aydınlatıcı sohbetlerimiz olmaksızın bu güvertenin ne kadar sıkıcı olduğunu anlatsam inanmazsın."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
